snippet: Kole Calhoun and Albert Pujols homered in the second inning as Los Angeles scored seven runs and routed Boston, 11-1.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Los Angeles Angels trounce Boston Red Sox, 11-1, in first game of doubleheader; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Kole Calhoun and Albert Pujols homered in the second inning as Los Angeles scored seven runs and routed Boston, 11-1.

headline.main: Angels Drub Visiting Red Sox in Makeup of a Rare Rainout
headline.print_headline: Angels Drub Visiting Red Sox in Makeup of a Rare Rainout
